label: uncl5249
comment: Code specifying the basis on which a percentage is calculated.

values.label: Per unit
values.comment: Referenced percentage applies on a single unit basis.

values.label: Per ton
values.comment: Reduction percentage is applied per transported ton.

values.label: Per equipment unit
values.comment: Reduction percentage is applied per main equipment unit (for rail purpose, only rail wagons).

values.label: Per unit price
values.comment: Reduction percentage is applied on the unit price, which is the basis of the charge calculation.

values.label: Per quantity
values.comment: Reduction percentage applied on the unit price and conceded to a consignor after he reached a specified tonnage of transport.

values.label: Basic charge
values.comment: Code to indicate that the IATA experimental special charge within Europe is the basis for the percentage reduction or surcharge.

values.label: Rate per kilogram
values.comment: Code to indicate that the IATA experimental special rate within in Europe is the basis for the percentage reduction or surcharge.

values.label: Minimum charge
values.comment: Code to indicate that the IATA minimum charge is the basis for the percentage reduction or surcharge.

values.label: Normal rate
values.comment: Code to indicate that the IATA normal rate is the basis for the percentage reduction or surcharge.

values.label: Quantity rate
values.comment: Code to indicate that the IATA quantity rate is the basis for the percentage reduction or surcharge.

values.label: Amount of drawing
values.comment: Referenced percentage applies on the amount of drawing under the documentary credit.

values.label: Documentary credit amount
values.comment: Referenced percentage applies on documentary credit amount.

values.label: Invoice value
values.comment: Referenced percentage applies on the invoice value.

values.label: CIF value
values.comment: Referenced percentage applies on CIF value.

values.label: Contract cost
values.comment: The percentage applied to the contract cost.

values.label: Labour hours
values.comment: The percentage applied to the labour hours.

values.label: LIBOR (London Inter-Bank Offered Rate)
values.comment: The percentage basis is London Inter-Bank Offered Rate (LIBOR).

values.label: FIBOR (Frankfurt Inter-Bank Offered Rate)
values.comment: The percentage basis is Frankfurt Inter-Bank Offered Rate (FIBOR).

values.label: PIBOR (Paris Inter-Bank Offered Rate)
values.comment: The percentage basis is Paris Inter-Bank Offered Rate (PIBOR).

values.label: Nationally based percentage basis
values.comment: The percentage basis is nationally based.
